name: Pirate bay modernized
description:
I decided to improve the interface and preserve the color theme.
Centered a lot of things, more space between objects, wider site. Every page has some changes - torrents, blog, etc.
Tested in Firefox.
additional_info:
Update 1: styled Register, Log in and Doodles
Update 2: fixed and changed some styles in torrents, slightly decreased the font size
Update 3: added space above footer, removed ads (but better use ublock/adblock)
Update 4: added the new domains
Update 5: removed domains
Update 6: added domain, small improvements - deleting torrent, adding comment, blog images, uploading torrent and more
Update 7: pagination of comments and some styles in blog
